channel.title: 317 server help
channel.description:
i have a 317 and i have everything working fine...except for maging.
The problem is when you try to ancient someone after you cast one time then try to cast again your character will run in meele range of your target then cast again so if you want to stay far from your target you have to cast then run cast then run.
How can i fix this? Thanks

item.title: 317 server help
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

um project insanity and hyperion are the server being mainly used now but it doesnt have corp. You will have to add the models and make your own ints in the item def 2 but to get in this um this is client sided then .

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server help
item.dc:creator: @Embold Embold
item.description:
@Embold wrote:

i have been looking for the past few days for one cant seem to find one what base would you recomend for a pvp based server? i want to have godwars and corp as well but its going to be mainly pvp.

I know how to code delta and im not to sure how hard it will be to change to something else but i am open to it, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server help
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

well delta is know for most customs like items minigames and ect but its known for worst combat system. The best combat system on delta is one of the top 10 private servers but you will have to try to find a guide.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server help
item.dc:creator: @Embold Embold
item.description:
@Embold wrote:

really? that stinks i added claws fixed godsword stuff…i kinda dont want to do it again, does anyone have an idea of what i would have to edit to fix this? :S

Read full topic

item.title: 317 server help
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

its the source i already know you got a delta source. Thats how delta is i havent seen many servers with it fixed to fix it you will have to find a guide or hard code it witch idk if you can do. So you will have to hard code it leave it how it is or get new source that has it fixed or non delta.

Read full topic
